name: Caravan and Motorhome Club
goal: The Caravan and Motorhome Club is a community of a million people who love the great outdoors.  Known as The Caravan Club until February 2017, it operates the largest privately-owned network of quality touring sites in the UK, offering members access to over 200 Club sites and 2,500 privately-owned places (Certificated Locations) to stay.  It also offers a choice of 300 sites across continental Europe.  The Club provides expert advice and training courses, overseas travel services and tours, insurance services and exclusive offers and discounts to members.
euInitiatives: Transport, environment, road safety, consumer protection, motor insurance.
